channel.title: jdk on Realjf's blog
channel.description: Recent content in jdk on Realjf's blog

item.title: Jdk 8 安装
item.description: jdk下载地址： https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/javase-jdk8-downloads.html 或者：https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/oracle-java-archive-downloads.html 这里提供百度云下载：链接: https://pan.baidu.com/s/1_fSe_nkdoZ_QhidbQyZ1ig 提取码: ttpw 准备环境 centos7 虚拟机 手动安装 检查系统是否已经安装了jdk，有就卸载默认的jdk rpm -qa | grep jdk ava-1.6.0-openjdk-1.6.0.35-1.13.7.1.el6_6.x86_64 java-1.7.0-openjdk-1.7.0.79-2.5.5.4.el6.x86_64 [root@node1 ~]# rpm -e --nodeps java-1.6.0-openjdk-1.6.0.35-1.13.7.1.el6_6.x86_64 [root@node1 ~]# rpm -e --nodeps java-1.7.0-openjdk-1.7.0.79-2.5.5.4.el6.x86_64 下载安装jdk wget https://download.oracle.com/otn/java/jdk/8u251-b08/3d5a2bb8f8d4428bbe94aed7ec7ae784/jdk-8u251-linux-x64.tar.gz tar zxvf jdk-8u251-linux-x64.tar.gz # 配置环境变量 vi /etc/profile export JAVA_HOME=/usr/local/jdk1.8.0_251 export PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin # 保存退出 :wq source /etc/profile # 验证 java -version
